QuestData.Title: A Gift For Ella
QuestData.Description: That poor Ella. She's so shy! I saw her standing in the Halfhill Market, looking really hungry, but afraid to talk to any of the chefs.$b$bWe should bring her some food! And not any boring food - something special.$b$bThe Kunzen hozen make spicy shrimp dumplings from ingredients they've stolen from our farms. I don't like spicy food, but Ella might!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: I can hear her stomach growling from way over here!
